channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Kneecap Blasts Norwegian Government at Oslo Festival, Accusing It of Funding ‘Genocide’ Against Palestinians
item.description: Kneecap brings the heat at Oslo Festival, calling out the Norwegian government 🔥✊ #MusicActivism #FestivalVibes

item.title: The 12 Best Moments of ENHYPEN’s ‘WALK THE LINE’ U.S. Tour Kick-Off in New York
item.description: 🌟 ENHYPEN electrified NYC with their 'WALK THE LINE' Tour! Relive the top moments that had fans screaming for more! 🎶 #ENHYPEN #WTLinNYC

item.title: Halestorm Unveil Video for “Like a Woman Can,” an “Ode to Bisexuality”: Watch
item.description: 🎸 Halestorm's powerful new video celebrates love in all forms! Check out "Like a Woman Can" now! 🌈 #Halestorm #MusicVideo #LoveIsLove

item.title: Good Charlotte Bring New Song “I Don’t Work Here Anymore” to Fallon: Watch
item.description: Good Charlotte rocked Fallon with their new jam "I Don’t Work Here Anymore"! 🎸 Who else is loving this tune? 🎶 #GoodCharlotte #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Indie Basement (8/8): the week in classic indie, alternative & college rock
item.description: 🎸 Rock on! Dive into the latest indie gems and timeless classics in this week's Indie Basement roundup! 🎶 #IndieRock #MusicMondays
